description:
Saber of Red is http://anidb.net/ch89992 [Shishigou Kairi]`s Servant.
[spoiler="True Name and Noble Phantasm"]Her true name is Mordred, the Knight of Treachery. She is the homunculus daughter of http://anidb.net/ch38 [Arturia Pendragon] and her sister http://anidb.net/ch91576 [Morgan le Fay]. She has a good relationship with her Master and wishes to use the grail to challenge her right to be King of Camelot and have her "father`s" recognition as her heir.
Her Noble Phantasm is Clarent Blood Arthur, a magic sword that can release a massive energy blast.[/spoiler]
Source: TYPE-MOON Wiki
name: Aka no Saber
